meta-title: Lucky Boo - your crypto lucky charm
title: Lucky Boo - your crypto lucky charm
description1: They say, that if you have some Lucky Boo, you’ll buy in the dips and sell at peaks only by intuition. Keep your Lucky

buy-subtitle: Buy $SHBN and your tokens will be automatically staked, plus you'll be eligible for a Massive airdrop!
buy-text: To get Lucky Boo Tokens at the presale price, simply connect your Solana-compatible wallet. Select the desired amount and proceed with the Solana payment. After completing the transfer, you will receive your $SHBN tokens within a few hours. Retain these tokens to become eligible for the airdrop.

story-text1: Lucky Boo, world cutest - puppy, conquers crypto's choppy waters, from China to the Western world, soaring above the chaos with a kiteboard he comes to a realization: rise above it.
story-text2: His enlightened spirit draws crypto enthusiasts seeking luck. The visions of the most Epic Airdrop so far have been shared by more than one and it has now become the vision of the Lucky Boo community.
how-title3: Ethereum Purchase via Optimism or Arbitrum
story-text3: As the day of the most Epic Airdrop approaches, Lucky Boo’s followers are waiting for the moment that will turn their visions of luck and fortune into reality.Feeling lucky?
how-to-buy1: To get Lucky Boo Tokens at the presale price, simply connect your Solana-compatible wallet. Select the desired amount and proceed with the Solana payment. After completing the transfer, you will receive your $SHBN tokens within a few hours. Retain these tokens to become eligible for the airdrop. Your participation in the airdrop will be automatically tracked as long as you hold the tokens.
how-to-buy2: Become a member of the Lucky Boo community on Zealy (Link here) to gain additional points contributing towards the $SHBN airdrop. Completing more tasks will reward you with more points. These points will be tallied and updated a few weeks following the launch.
how-to-buy3: Now you're all set, with a spot in the most Epic Airdrop ever and a lucky charm for good fortune in crypto!
luckynomics-text: Discover your Lucky Boo - where among 8.1 billion people, fortune favors everyone.

walkmap-text: Lucky Boo likes to go for walkies and he’s going to places. But as any good puppy, he’ll follow your lead. It’s up to you where to take him.

faq1: What Magic Is This? Unveiling Lucky Boo's Epic Airdrop
faq1-answer: Lucky Boo has mastered the secrets of the crypto ocean and is riding highs and gliding through lows on Solana chain. Being a smart puppy, Lucky Boo will use 40% of tokens to reward the first followers who will be showered in abundance of tokens no one has ever witnessed in Solana token history.
faq2-answer: $SHBN tokens are not just digital assets; they're your lucky charms in the vast crypto universe. Holding $SHBN brings more than just potential financial gains; it brings a touch of luck to your digital wallet. Beyond the promise of prosperity, $SHBN tokens offer several benefits, including voting rights in Lucky Boo community decisions, and the magic of being part of the Most Epic Airdrop in Solana's history. Keep $SHBN close, and let the waves of fortune flow.
faq3: How Does One Become Lucky Boo Follower?
faq3-answer: Joining the Lucky Boo sanctum is as easy as wagging a tail! Head over to our official website or social media channels and hit follow or subscribe. To become a true follower, get hold of the $SHBN token and get ready to catch waves of luck coming your way!
faq4: Where we can buy and sell $SHBN?
faq4-answer: $SHBN can be traded on Birdeye.so, Jup.ag, Raydium.io, and other major decentralized exchanges (DEXs).
faq5-answer: Yes, $SHBN will be listed on most major worldwide exchanges.
faq6: Rewards for the Early Believers in Luck
faq6-answer: Our early believers, or as we like to call them, the "First Wave," hold a special place in Lucky Boo's heart. As a token of gratitude, they're set for rewardsstarting with the most Epic Airdrop ever. This isn't just any airdrop; it's a shower of $SHBN tokens, rewarding their faith and support from the beginning.
faq7: On Guarding Your Fortune: Safety with Lucky Boo
faq7-answer: Lucky Boo's digital realm is super secure, safe from the sneaky glitches of the online world. Our tech wizards have worked their magic, ensuring the airdrop and all your transactions are smooth and sound. Just a friendly reminder from Lucky Boo: Keep your private keys as safe as your favorite lucky charm—because in this adventure, they're your ticket to treasure!
footer-text: $hiboon is a meme cryptocurrency for entertainment without intrinsic value, financial return expectations, a formal team, or a roadmap. It's designed purely for fun.
